keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Conservatives will continue pensioners' Winter Fuel Allowances.
The Conservatives will safeguard free TV licenses and Bus Passes.
If the Conservatives get elected then the NHS will be protected against cuts.
David Cameron has made it absolutely clear that he WILL maintain Labour's guarantee to see a cancer specialist within two weeks if your GP suspects you have cancer.
The Conservatives will extend Child Tax Credit, except for high earners.
Wherever you see or hear Labour talking about Conservative policies you can be pretty sure that they will not cut or freeze the nursery provision from 12.5 to 15 hours a week, for 3 and 4 year olds.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Gordon Brown is clearly trying to woo the LibDems to form a coalition with Labour. The only real risk in this election is him going through with it. The only way to stop him is to give the seat for a better majority to the Conservatives.

issues.health: If the Conservatives get elected then the NHS will be protected against cuts.
issues.socialWelfare: The Conservatives will continue pensioners' Winter Fuel Allowances, free TV licenses and Bus Passes.

images.caption: Campaign leaflet for Nicky Morgan, Conservative Parliamentary Candidate for Loughborough.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet criticizes the Labour Party for distributing scare tactics about Conservative policies.
